TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ContentTypes extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Supports [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as a content type and resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The only purpose of this class is to provide the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] type string for [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as a public field.

Docs.returns: A string that is used to identify [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] as a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mime](../../add/includes/tlasharptla-mime-md.md)] type.
